name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Dragon Scale Armor
description: A suit of armor crafted from the scales of a dragon.
looks: The armor is made from tough dragon scales that have been expertly crafted together to provide maximum protection. It has a sleek and intimidating appearance, with intricate patterns and a deep shade of black and red.

special_effects.dragon_resistance: Provides high resistance to fire and acid damage

name: Staff of the Arcane
description: A mystical staff that harnesses the power of magic.
looks: The staff is made of a smooth and polished wood with a crystal orb at the top. The orb glows with a soft blue light, constantly emitting small sparks of energy.

special_effects.spell_power: Increases the potency of spells by 20%.

name: Dagger of Poison
description: A deadly dagger coated with a potent poison.
looks: The dagger has a short, curved blade with a serrated edge. The handle is wrapped in black leather and adorned with a small green gemstone.

special_effects.poisonous_strike: 25% chance to apply poison to the target, dealing additional damage over time.

name: Enchanted Dagger
description: A small but powerful dagger infused with magical enchantments.
looks: The dagger has a slender blade made of shimmering silver. The hilt is adorned with intricate runes that glow with a soft blue light.

special_weapon_skills.Dagger Mastery: Increases the damage and critical hit chance with daggers.

special_effects.mind_steal: Absorbs 5 mana from the target with each successful hit.

name: Enchanted Bow
description: A bow infused with powerful enchantments.
looks: The bow is made of polished wood and adorned with intricate runes. It has a vibrant glow and emits a soft humming sound.

special_effects.enchanted_arrows: Arrows shot from this bow are infused with elemental magic, dealing additional damage based on the target's weakness.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A staff infused with restorative magic that can heal wounds and mend injuries.
looks: The staff has a wooden shaft with intricate engravings of healing symbols. The top of the staff is adorned with a crystal that glows with a gentle, soothing light.

special_effects.healing_touch: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells and abilities.

name: Enchanted Amulet
description: A mystical amulet that provides powerful enchantments to the wearer.
looks: The amulet is made of silver and adorned with intricate symbols and gemstones that shimmer with magical energy.

special_effects.spell_power: Increases the power of spells cast by the wearer.

looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that radiates healing energy.
looks: The staff has a polished wooden handle with engraved symbols of healing. At the top of the staff, there is a crystal orb that emits a soothing light.

special_effects.aura_of_healing: Emits a healing aura that restores HP to nearby allies.
